text: @nytimes @BistyCSRoss Keep it up, #airlines. Soon no one will agree to fly. FOR A LOONG TIME. Maybe you’ll be gone before we fly again, based on these crap experiences you’re dishing out. #covid #covid19 #flights #flying #airtravel #airplane #pandemic #travelling #travellife #travelblogger
